fields.name: Beanie Hat
fields.description: You asked and we listened... Our Beanies Hats have already became best sellers and will always have you looking fresh despite the weather. This is our Red Beanie with out iconic logo embroidered on the front. As always we will never sacrifice quality for profits so you can rest assured it has been made with the most premium of materials to give you that luxury look and feel.

fields.name: Backpack
fields.description: This iconic backpack is reimagined as a squared-off shape with one functional front pocket. This monochrome design leaves space for the essentials in the main compartment, padded 13inch laptop sleeve, and bottle holder.

fields.name: iPhone Case
fields.description: Introducing the BIRD Phone Case, optimised to prevent yellowing, long lasting clarity, 6.6ft drop protection and made from 65% recycled and plant-based materials

fields.name: Water Bottle
fields.description: This stylish 500ml insulated water bottle uses airtight vacuum sealed lids to keep your drink at its ideal temperature. Toxin free metal water bottle, comes with a protective cotton sleeve for easy carrying. Perfect eco friendly gifts for sports, cycling, running, travel, work and school.

fields.name: T Shirt
fields.description: Add to your essentials with this Logo T Shirt. Crafted in a soft cotton and elastane blend fabric for a super soft and stretchy feel, this t shirt is cut in a regular fit and features a ribbed crew neckline, short sleeves, a straight hemline and elasticated trims for a comfortable wear. The look is complete with BIRD branding printed to the chest for brand appreciation. Pair with slim fit jeans and a lightweight jacket for a smart yet casual look. 94% Cotton, 6% Elastane. Hand wash only. Size selection: Standard sizing Fits true to size, take your normal size Cut in a regular fit 94% Cotton, 6% Elastane Hand wash only Keep away from fire
